description: Mobile techniques used by WolfRAT, ATT&CK software S0489 (v1.0)
name: WolfRAT (S0489)

techniques.comment: [WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can collect user account, photos, browser history, and arbitrary files.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can update the running malware.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can delete files from the device.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) has masqueraded as “Google service”, “GooglePlay”, and “Flash update”.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) uses `dumpsys` to determine if certain applications are running.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can collect the device’s call log.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can collect the device’s contact list.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can record the screen and take screenshots to capture messages from Line, Facebook Messenger, and WhatsApp.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can delete and send SMS messages.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can obtain a list of installed applications.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) sends the device’s IMEI with each exfiltration request.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can take photos and videos.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
[WolfRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0489) can perform primitive emulation checks.(Citation: Talos-WolfRAT)
